title: TUI StudyTime Settings
description: Configuration for the TUI version of StudyTime

version.description: Schema version, in the form of a single integer. Assuming v1 if not explicitly provided.

database-file.description: The file which you want to save your progress in. Assuming `studytime.db` if not explicitly provided.

theme.description: Preferred theme for the application. Defaults to `unipd-dark`. Can always be changed from within the application.
